title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.6 - Penalties for noncompliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 500.6 - Penalties for noncompliance

State Regulations

Any person, firm, association or corporation, or any
agent, officer, employee or member thereof who fails to comply with section
500.5
of this

Part, will: (a) if convicted in a
criminal proceeding, be guilty of a misdemeanor and, if a natural person, shall
be punished by a fine not exceeding $500, or by imprisonment for not longer
than six months; and if a firm, association or a corporation by a fine not
exceeding $5,000; (b) if, in a
civil proceeding, be found to have committed a violation, shall be subjected, if a natural person, to a civil penalty not exceeding $500, and, if a firm, association or corporation, to a civil penalty not exceeding $5,000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
500.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
